titleStmt.title: A confutation of the Dutch-Arminian tenent of universal redemption with relation in special unto certain sectaries in England : by name, the Morians or Revelators, with others tracing them, who hold that Christ died for all men, good and bad / by Theoph. Brabourne.
titleStmt.author: Brabourne, Theophilus, b. 1590.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
